membership.title: Become A Member
description: Pay yearly membership fee.
*This is a required fee in order to become a member of Upgrade Wellness Center.
You’ll receive an email about renewal every year on your anniversary date. To cancel, please call us.

sessions.title: 2 Hour Session
description: Children 12 & under are free to accompany their parent.
UNIFYD Members receive 10% off at checkout (code: Unifyd). Please email membership proof to services@upgradewellnesscenter.com.

sessions.title: 3 Hour Session
description: Children 12 & under are free to accompany their parent.
UNIFYD Members receive 10% off at checkout (code: Unifyd). Please email membership proof to services@upgradewellnesscenter.com.

sessions.title: 4 Hour Session
description: Children 12 & under are free to accompany their parent.
UNIFYD Members receive 10% off at checkout (code: Unifyd). Please email membership proof to services@upgradewellnesscenter.com.

sessions.title: 2 Hour Veteran Session
description: Welcome all Veterans and thank you for your service.
Enjoy a $20 discount on each 2-hour session you book.

sessions.title: Pet Energy Session
description: Dogs must be crated or leashed at all times. Cats must be crated.
Please ensure they are well-behaved.

overnight.title: 12 Hour Overnight Energy Session
description: Overnight 12-hour session.
We offer a queen cabinet bed and several recliners that lay completely flat.

overnight.title: 12 Hour Overnight Couples Energy Session
description: Overnight stay for 12 hours for two.
Includes cabinet bed and recliners that lay completely flat.

packages.title: Unlimited Monthly Package
description: Unlimited hourly sessions up to 4 hours per session, Monday–Thursday only.
Runs from the 1st to the last day of the month.
**Packages are sold individually, not split between clients, and cannot be used on overnight sessions. Non-refundable.**
A free journal to track your health journey is included.

packages.title: (5) 2 Hour Sessions
description: Five 2-hour sessions at $45/hour — new customer promotion.
**Packages are sold individually, not split between clients, and cannot be used on overnight sessions. Non-refundable.**
